p: Chen et al. [ 18] have used oseltamivir (75 mg), lopinavir (500 mg), ritonavir (500 mg) per os twice daily followed by ganciclovir (0.25 g) intravenously for 3â€“14 days in COVID-19 infected patients and they have shown safety hence can be considered as treatment options [ 18]. EIDD-2801 compound has proven effective against influenza viruses and can be evaluated against SARS-CoV-2 as well [ 178].
